#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ull unsigned long long int
#define ll unsigned long long
#define sd(a) scanf("%d",&a)
#define pf printf
int main()
{
    int t,k,i,c;
    ull n;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>n>>k;
        c=0;
        if(k==1)
        {
            cout<<n<<endl;
            continue;
        }
        while(n)
		{
			c+=(n%k);
			n=n/k;
		}
		cout<<c<<endl;
    }
  return 0;
}
